to January 2014 Provided all levels of support for a multispecialty medical group with 12 locations and over 300 employees Our team provided support on a 247 basis Performed scheduled server maintenance and addressed vendor support related issues Supported the various EMREHR systems in use across the organization Delivered applications and virtual desktops to users via Citrix Utilized alerts if sites or services went offline Established a version controlled drive imaging solution for laptops and desktops Maintained our VMware vSphere and EqualLogic SAN infrastructure Monitored system performance completed scheduled maintenance and addressed afterhours support requirements Simplified routing across our expanding network by coordinating the implementation of EIGRP and CDP
